thread.title: BRIEF-Pershing Square Capital Management Takes Sole Share Stake In Nike, Raises Sole Share Stake In Mondelez

title: BRIEF-Pershing Square Capital Management Takes Sole Share Stake In Nike, Raises Sole Share Stake In Mondelez
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Nike Inc:
* PERSHING SQUARE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT TAKES SOLE SHARE STAKE OF 5.8 MILLION CLASS B SHARES IN NIKE INC - SEC FILING
* PERSHING SQUARE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT RAISES SOLE SHARE STAKE IN MONDELEZ INTERNATIONAL TO 23.3 MILLION CLASS A SHARES FROM 13.9 MILLION CLASS A SHARES
* PERSHING SQUARE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2BtFi5X )
Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2ht1FNW )
